info.title: Azure Sql Database API spec
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the auditing policy applies.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

get.description: Returns an Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database for which the auditing policy applies.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for createing or updating a Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

get.description: Returns an Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

useServerDefault.description: Indicates whether the default server auditing policy is used for that Azure SQL Database.

auditingState.description: The auditing state of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

eventTypesToAudit.description: The events types of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

storageAccountName.description: The storage account name of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

storageAccountKey.description: The primary storage account key of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

storageAccountSecondaryKey.description: The secondary key of the storage account of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

storageTableEndpoint.description: The storage table endpoint of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

storageAccountResourceGroupName.description: The resource group of the storage account of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

storageAccountSubscriptionId.description: The subscription Id of the storage account of the Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

retentionDays.description: The retention in days of the Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

auditLogsTableName.description: The name of the table audit logs are written to in the Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

fullAuditLogsTableName.description: The full name of the table audit logs are written to in the Azure SQL Database auditing policy.

DatabaseAuditingPolicyProperties.description: Represents the properties of an Azure SQL auditing policy.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

ServerAuditingPolicy.description: Represents an Azure SQL Server auditing policy.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription.
